original_text: Thomas, who was called Didymus, said to the other disciples, ‘We should go with our Teacher, so that we can die with him!’
korean_text: 디두모라고도 하는 도마가 다른 제자들에게 말하되 우리도 주와 함께 죽으러 가자 하니라

sentences.original_text: We should go with our Teacher,
so that we can die with him!
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그와 함께 죽을 수 있도록!
